# rangeForUserCompletion

**Instance Property**

The partial range from the most recent beginning of a word up to the insertion point.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var rangeForUserCompletion: NSRange { get }
```

## Discussion

This value is intended to be used for the range argument in the text completion methods such as [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextView/completions(forPartialWordRange:indexOfSelectedItem:)].

## Performing text completion

- **complete(_:)**: Invokes completion in a text view.
- **completions(forPartialWordRange:indexOfSelectedItem:)**: Returns an array of potential completions, in the order to be presented, representing possible word completions available from a partial word.
- **insertCompletion(_:forPartialWordRange:movement:isFinal:)**: Inserts the selected completion into the text at the appropriate location.
